data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
For the database category there seems to be structured top level.
    The form format DB is what makes STDmaker and SVDmaker work. The
    field and record separation characters are easier to parse and
    escape than CSV. Being text base and looking very close to a form,
    allows direct access and maintance with any text editor.

    Part of 2167A Bundle

    Test::TestUtil

    Test::Tech

    DataPort::DataFile DataPort::FileType::FormDB

    Test::STDmaker ExtUtils::SVDmaker
